message.body: If you get a return label for something I ordered, don't bother sending it to me because I had the form forwarded to my email address. TBBWoC
Gpa how do you do bold?
By putting part of the message in the subject field. CAUTION: if you only write in the Subject field but not in the Text field, message cannot be sent
Hmmm where is the subject field
On top of the Message field
